name.full: Full name of app, if longer than 30 characters (<=100 chars)

description.short: Short description of your app (<= 80 chars)
description.full: Full description of your app (<= 4000 chars)

icons.outline: A relative path to a transparent .png icon — 32px X 32px
icons.color: A relative path to a full color .png icon — 192px X 192px
